tool_description: Hacker News is a social news website focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship. This is a community listing of the Hacker News GraphQL Proxy.
name: Hacker News GraphQL Proxy
title: Hacker News GraphQL Proxy

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.description: Edit Variable values to ensure a successful API response & customize your request. Example queries can be found in the [About](https://rapidapi.com/rapidapi/api/hacker-news-graphql-proxy1/details) page!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hacker-news-graphql-proxy1.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hacker-news-graphql-proxy1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
